Name: Terraria-tModloader
Overview:
This Docker will download and install Terraria and the tModloader and run it. SERVER PASSWORD: Docker

ATTENTION: The Container will check on every start/restart if there is a newer version of the game available and install it if so.

Update Notice: Change the game version to whatever version do you want and restart the container.

WEB CONSOLE: You can connect to the Terraria console by opening your browser and go to HOSTIP:9013 (eg: 192.168.1.1:9013) or click on WebUI on the Docker page within Unraid.
DonateText: If you like my work please

TCP - WebConsole.Name: TCP - WebConsole
TCP - WebConsole.Description: WebConsole (by default, you can connect to the Terraria console by opening your browser and go to HOSTIP:9013 - eg: 192.168.1.1:9013 - or click on WebUI on the Docker page within Unraid).

Preferred Terraria version.Name: Preferred Terraria version
Preferred Terraria version.Description: Enter your prefered Terraria version (you can get the latest version number for example here: https://terraria.fandom.com/wiki/Server#Downloads)

GAME_PARAMS.Name: GAME_PARAMS
GAME_PARAMS.Description: Enter your start up commands for the server.
